item.description:
Ever since you blew out your first birthday candle you have been practicing a ritual. This class will introduce you to the basics of ritual construction, when to write your own and when to use others, what should be included and most important what elements are most effective in ritual performance. Even if you have been doing your own spells for years, this class will give a solid foundation on the “how” and “why” of Spellwork and Rituals

Class begins at 6PM with Open Circle beginning at 7:30PM
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Beginning Ritual
